verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: When the sun is rolled up.
verse.verse_3: When the mountains are set in motion.
verse.verse_6: When the oceans are set aflame.
verse.verse_8: When the girl, buried alive, is asked:
verse.verse_9: For what crime was she killed?
verse.verse_10: When the records are made public.
verse.verse_11: When the sky is peeled away.
verse.verse_12: When the Fire is set ablaze.
verse.verse_14: Each soul will know what it has readied.
verse.verse_17: And by the night as it recedes.
verse.verse_18: And by the morn as it breathes.
verse.verse_19: This is the speech of a noble messenger.
verse.verse_20: Endowed with power, eminent with the Lord of the Throne.
verse.verse_23: He saw him on the luminous horizon.
verse.verse_24: And He does not withhold knowledge of the Unseen.
verse.verse_25: And it is not the word of an accursed devil.
verse.verse_27: It is only a Reminder to all mankind.
verse.verse_28: To whoever of you wills to go straight.
verse.verse_29: But you cannot will, unless God wills-The Lord of the Worlds.
